title: Step Inside a Connecticut Modern Farmhouse That’s Secretly 300 Years Old
body: Like so many modern relationships, the New Canaan, Connecticut–based architecture firm Brooks & Falotico and their soon-to-be client, Tyler Mitchell, met through social media.

title: Tour a Historic Washington, D.C., Home That’s As Sophisticated As It Is Fun
body: Most designers try to persuade clients to take risks, but, occasionally, a decorator will come across that unicorn client who is willing to try anything.

title: This Nuclear-Powered Superyacht Is Longer Than the Titanic and Costs $700 Million
body: A nuclear-powered gigayacht longer than the Titanic, with 22 state-of-the art laboratories and a 13-story “science sphere,” might sound like the floating headquarters of a criminal mastermind.

title: The World’s Most Amazing Vacation Rentals on Netflix
body: Are hotels over? Probably not, but the new Netflix show The World's Most Amazing Vacation Rentals certainly makes the case for staying in private homes instead.

title: How a Pair of Architects Are Remaking the Future for the Homeless
body: For Gisue Hariri and Mojgan Hariri, the meaning of home has always been integral to their practice as family and architects.
